TopicTitle: Sensor Array Nose Cone and Water

Articles.Content: Does it work in water or was the one time I tried just bugged? "In water" as in a safe splash-down in the actual water biome.
I'm pretty sure it doesn't. Doesn't work in space either, it had me thinking it was bugged for a while too.
Hmm... I have no idea, I've never used the thing before.
I see no reason why it shouldn't the water is a separate biome
It's a gas-analyzing instrument. Liquid water isn't a gas. I think it should work on a floating ship as long as the instrument itself isn't submerged, though, shouldn't it?
